author: Xbox
description:
Welcome to Albion, Governor! 

Discover these mysterious Celtic wetlands, where no civilized Roman wants to be. From architectural styles to which deities to worship, the degree to which you Romanize your provinces is up to you. Will you embrace local Celtic culture or impose Roman traditions? The fate of this region—and your legacy—is yours to decide.

Anno 117: Pax Romana is available November 13, 2025 📜

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/anno-117-pax-romana/9NFMQ8MP7353/0017

author: Xbox
description:
Microsoft Flight Simulator: City Update 12 beautifully enhances seven urban regions in Germany across five of its states: Augsburg in the state of Bavaria, Bremen in the state of Bremen, Dresden and its borough, Leuben, along with Leipzig in the state of Saxony, Kiel in the state of Schleswig-Holstein, and Münster in the state of North Rhine-Westphalia. This latest offering invites Microsoft Flight Simulator aviators to soar throughout castles, botanical gardens, bridges, towering skyscrapers, and more, reproduced in exquisite detail. 

City Update 12: Germany is available FREE to all owners of Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024. Download it today. The sky is calling!

https://www.xbox.com/games/microsoft-flight-simulator-2024

author: Xbox
description:
FINAL FANTASY VII remake series director, Naoki Hamaguchi, talks more about the game and what you can expect from this title being part of Xbox Play Anywhere. Enter the world of FINAL FANTASY VII on Xbox Series X|S, Xbox on PC or even the ROG Xbox Ally and Xbox Ally X.

The critically acclaimed FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE INTERGRADE is coming to Xbox this winter. Wishlist now!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/final-fantasy-vii-remake-intergrade/9nrqvq7zrm7z

FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE INTERGRADE retells the original story of FINAL FANTASY VII up to the escape from Midgar with unforgettable characters, breathtaking visuals and epic battles, which mixes traditional command-based combat and real-time action. It also includes FF7R EPISODE INTERMISSION, an additional story starring Yuffie Kisaragi that offers a fresh perspective running in parallel to Cloud's journey.

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

author: Xbox
description:
Welcome to Beastro! Where not all heroes wield swords, some prefer the spoon!
Don your apron in this cozy adventure fused with delicious deckbuilding! Build up your cozy town-to-table restaurant, grow ingredients and gather resources to craft delicious meals for the Caretakers who keep the troubles stirring outside the village walls at bay.
Let’s face it, who can save the world on an empty stomach?
Coming to Xbox Series X|S & Game Pass in 2026!

author: Xbox
description:
Go behind-the-scenes of the making of the ROG Xbox Ally.

The ROG Xbox Ally and Xbox Ally X unlocks a gaming library that travels with you like never before. Experience immersive gameplay from anywhere with most titles hitting between 30fps and 60fps.

VRR, or Variable Refresh Rate, ensures that gameplay remains consistent and fluid. Use the ASUS Armoury Crate to further fine tune your gameplay experience with options like optimizing battery life and remapping buttons. Xbox makes understanding how a game will run on the devices simple with performance check labels. Compatibility tests ensure things like text size and menu UI are scaled properly for the device’s screens so there’s no roadblocks to the fun. Download games from PC storefronts like Battle.net, Epic Game Store, Ubisoft, Steam, GOG.com and EA. With the unified game library you can find recently downloaded and played games in one place—easy and effortlessly accessible. Download PC games to play natively on the device. Consol
title: Inside the ROG Xbox Ally: Game Access and Compatibility

author: Xbox
description:
Developed by Game Science, "Black Myth: Zhong Kui"—the second entry in the Black Myth series—was officially unveiled today with its first CG teaser trailer, and simultaneously debuted during Gamescom Opening Night Live 2025.

This single-player action role-playing game draws its primary creative inspiration from the famed Chinese folk figure "Zhong Kui". As the project is still in early development, no in-game footage is available at this time.

BUY NOW:

author: Xbox
description:
The highly acclaimed ARPG Black Myth: Wukong has now been officially released on Xbox Series X|S.

Black Myth: Wukong is an action RPG rooted in Chinese mythology. The story is based on Journey to the West, one of the Four Great Classical Novels of Chinese literature. You shall set out as the Destined One to venture into the challenges and marvels ahead, to uncover the obscured truth beneath the veil of a glorious legend from the past.

BUY NOW: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/productid/9NWQ1Q1FR0C9
